column5: Cozy historic bedroom of the Langley Estate now available for your enjoyment. Next door to Cross Timbers Winery and 3 blocks to downtown Grapevine!! You can book this along with the other room if you need a 2 bedroom both with private entryway for a special price if you book both. See other ARBNB called WALKING DISTANCE to Downtown Grapevine for booking both rooms. Great for business traveler 2 miles away from Gaylord Convention Center, 10 minutes from DFW airport,parks and lake.
